---
title: "Places a copy of the 3panel figures in the_best.rds in a path"
output: 
  pdf_document: 
    fig_height: 7
---

 

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
rm(list = ls())
setwd("~/WORKSHOP/ESBJERG2/PUBLICATION/")

# Load base names to match
df <- readRDS("OUTPUT/the_best.rds")

# All 3-panel figure files
all3panelfigs <- list.files(
  path = "FIGURES/",
  pattern = "3panel",
  full.names = TRUE
)

# Target directory
output_dir <- "FIGURES/THESIGNIFICANTONES/"

# Clean the target directory
if (dir.exists(output_dir)) {
  file.remove(list.files(output_dir, full.names = TRUE))
} else {
  dir.create(output_dir)
}
 
# Build expected filenames and match exactly
ic <- 0
for (base in df[[1]]) {
  target_filename <- paste0(base, "_3panel_bootstrap_beta1.png")
  match <- all3panelfigs[basename(all3panelfigs) == target_filename]
  if (length(match) > 0) {
    file.copy(from = match, to = output_dir, overwrite = TRUE)
    cat("Copied:", basename(match), "\n")
    ic <- ic+1
  }
}
print(c("Copied ",ic))
```
